column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I guess I don't know about other ramen places
column2: but this is a treat. The prices are reasonable and the array of ramen soups is mind blowing. I always add an egg and get medium spicy. The staff are good at figuring out what spice level you want. Some of the seating is communal
column3: most of it is cramped and loud
column4: so go with friends you don't mind being close to.
